meanings.sent1: The nematologist carefully observed the tiny nematodes under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The nematologist published a groundbreaking paper on nematode behavior.
meanings.sent3: The nematologist joked that nematodes were the real rulers of the soil kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The nematologist's dedication to studying nematodes was as deep as the worms' burrows.
meanings.sent5: The nematologist's passion for nematodes was infectious among the research team.

meanings.definition: A specialist in the field of nematology.
meanings.sent1: The nematologist's expertise in nematology was unmatched in the scientific community.
meanings.sent2: As a nematologist, she traveled the world to share her knowledge on nematode control.
meanings.sent3: The nematologist humorously referred to herself as the 'nematode whisperer'.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nematology, the nematologist was a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The nematologist's insights into nematology were as valuable as gold in the research field.
